channel.title: Error trying to log in:
channel.description:
Alright so my server was working great, and I was on it enjoying it, and then my windows updater, automatically updated my comp on its own, and now I having that negative prompt saying "No response from server, try using a different world", and I tried deleting the cache many times, I also checked everywhere and everything is set at 127.0.0.1 and my no-ip is set at the correct places, and idea whats causing this problem ? Its a 317 (PvPscapez). Please help me, if you can show me on teamviewer/skype me, Ill PM you my info.
Here is the image:
http://prntscr.com/2sj4z

item.title: Error trying to log in:
item.dc:creator: @Creative_I Creative I
item.description:
@Creative_I wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:19, topic:472643”]Did you even attempt the method I used for uTorrent or did you just reply?
Make sure uTorrent is allowed past winders firewall.[/quote]

I did give that a try, I still cant get my internet to portfoward, when I go on canyouseeme.org doesnt work at all and all I get for Port: 43594 is a Error message on site, and Ive tried many different ways as logging into my router as well, and still couldnt get it to work…

Read full topic

item.title: Error trying to log in:
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Did you even attempt the method I used for uTorrent or did you just reply?
Make sure uTorrent is allowed past winders firewall.

Read full topic

item.title: Error trying to log in:
item.dc:creator: @Creative_I Creative I
item.description:
@Creative_I wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:17, topic:472643”][quote author=Creative I link=topic=590446.msg4179909#msg4179909 date=1355389177]

Did you edit anything recently? I’m having the same issue, but mine is cause I edited my client.java and it doesn’t work. Mine ain’t hard to fix, but yeah, you should check into the last files you edited.

well all that Ive been editing is my character.txt file, thats pretty much it when it comes to server wise.[quote author=sk8rdude461

link=topic=590446.msg4179772#msg4179772 date=1355370098]

This usually happens with too many failed login attempts.

My server does it if you try to login in less than a minute of last failed XD
Pisses people off but I found it lulzy.
[/quote]

Sk8er is your server online and how do you get other people to play on it ? Did you make it into a .jar file ? Also I figured out the main problem causing me from logging in, okay when im not running DUC (No-Ip) and uTorrent (Portfowarding), I log in, but when I do have those files open and running, it gives me that prompt on the loggin in screen “blah blah try using a different world”. Do you know whats causing that ?
[/quote]
I didn’t know you could jar a server.
They might be conflicting. Or you just don’t know how to port forward with utorrent correctly.
I suggest trying this:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


This is how I used to run servers on utorrent:

  1. Run the DUC
  2. Open utorrent, set it’s port to anything NOT 43594.
  3. Run server.
  4. Change utorrent’s port back to 43594
  5. Close server
  6. Run server
    Go ahead and try that if you’d like.[/quote]

Alright well before I try all these steps I wanna start off by saying, everytime Im portfowarding on utorrent and when I try to log in, it gives my that error, but when I close utorrent it lets me log in, and also Im trying to get my friends to connect and they get to the log in and it says “Error Connecting To Server”, also everytime I go on canyouseeme.org to see if port is running good, it says Error and that it isnt, but the server is running great on my side, any suggestions ?

And for some reason I think my dumbass computer doesnt wanna cooperate with me in the portfowarding for my friends to go, so when portfoward works, does that mean my friends can go on my server ?

Read full topic

item.title: Error trying to log in:
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Creative I, post:15, topic:472643”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=590446.msg4179673#msg4179673 date=1355364658]
Did you edit anything recently? I’m having the same issue, but mine is cause I edited my client.java and it doesn’t work. Mine ain’t hard to fix, but yeah, you should check into the last files you edited.
[/quote]

well all that Ive been editing is my character.txt file, thats pretty much it when it comes to server wise.[quote author=sk8rdude461

link=topic=590446.msg4179772#msg4179772 date=1355370098]

This usually happens with too many failed login attempts.

My server does it if you try to login in less than a minute of last failed XD
Pisses people off but I found it lulzy.
[/quote]

Sk8er is your server online and how do you get other people to play on it ? Did you make it into a .jar file ? Also I figured out the main problem causing me from logging in, okay when im not running DUC (No-Ip) and uTorrent (Portfowarding), I log in, but when I do have those files open and running, it gives me that prompt on the loggin in screen “blah blah try using a different world”. Do you know whats causing that ?[/quote]
I didn’t know you could jar a server.
They might be conflicting. Or you just don’t know how to port forward with utorrent correctly.
I suggest trying this:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


This is how I used to run servers on utorrent:

  1. Run the DUC
  2. Open utorrent, set it’s port to anything NOT 43594.
  3. Run server.
  4. Change utorrent’s port back to 43594
  5. Close server
  6. Run server
    Go ahead and try that if you’d like.

Read full topic

item.title: Error trying to log in:
item.dc:creator: @makersprivate123 makersprivate123
item.description:
@makersprivate123 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:10, topic:472643”][quote author=Host Gushers link=topic=590446.msg4179537#msg4179537 date=1355355498]

I suggest that you dont use pvpscape because 10% armour is updated and the rest is not so like bandos tasset isnt updated and chestplate is…If you want to continue just post and i will give u some steps…p.s noone will spoonfeed you on this forums so dont ask for skype or t.v

Hey. Dude, Gushers. STOP telling him what source to use. Let the guy figure it out.
Oh, and as for that spoonfeed comment. No, we won’t. But we do push you to the right direction instead of off a cliff.

ok Jesus…im just trying to help him because i made that mistake of using pvpscape and i spent 1 month and i have to redo all that i just dont want him to go through all that for nothing.
[/quote]
And my name is Jesse, I know, it’s close to Jesus.[/quote]
Haha

Read full topic

item.title: Error trying to log in:
item.dc:creator: @Creative_I Creative I
item.description:
@Creative_I wrote:

Illadelph:

did your static ip happen to change at all?

not at all, it hasnt changed I prolly checked over 100000 different posts on people having this problem and nobody could solve it, so hopefully we can, and it could help somebody else, in future preferences.

Host Gushers:

I suggest that you dont use pvpscape because 10% armour is updated and the rest is not so like bandos tasset isnt updated and chestplate is…If you want to continue just post and i will give u some steps…p.s noone will spoonfeed you on this forums so dont ask for skype or t.v

Okay, then what do you suggest me to use ? I wanna hear it from your side, I really like TrisidiaX’s source/client because of the items, no other server have I found thats 317 with items like this … whats your suggestion ??? & True, that does make you a lot better.

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:7, topic:472643”][quote author=Host Gushers link=topic=590446.msg4179178#msg4179178 date=1355329764]
I suggest that you dont use pvpscape because 10% armour is updated and the rest is not so like bandos tasset isnt updated and chestplate is…If you want to continue just post and i will give u some steps…p.s noone will spoonfeed you on this forums so dont ask for skype or t.v
[/quote]
Hey. Dude, Gushers. STOP telling him what source to use. Let the guy figure it out.
Oh, and as for that spoonfeed comment. No, we won’t. But we do push you to the right direction instead of off a cliff.[/quote]

And sk8er you’ve been helping me the most, I really appreciate it, thanks man! Do you have any suggestions on what may be causing this ? Ive deleted cache a million times and restarted like that, also I have deleted the client and tried like that, still has worked, and I havent changed anything except JDK’s and No-Ips, thats just about it.

Read full topic
